duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate demand for textbooks and courseware solutions through outbound cold calling and strategic email outreach.
Qualify prospects and set appointments for the broader sales team, supporting pre-sale and post-sale activities.
Identify opportunities for referral selling by leveraging high-value relationships with existing customers.
Ensure accurate flow of data is maintained and updated in the CRM database.
Drive high customer satisfaction with a problem-solving attitude and collaborative spirit.
Collaborate with sales representatives to engage faculty teaching courses and manage campaigns to build and refine the sales pipeline.
Attend in-person collaboration sessions at the office as required and travel to sales meetings if needed.
Learn about SAGE’s U.S. College territories, customers, and competitors to achieve ongoing growth and success.

education_certification.credential: Completion of College Level coursework or demonstrated record of success in academic and professional background.
